title: Intro to Probability
author: Biltzstein, Hwang
completion: Ch.3 Random Variables and Their Distributions
description: An introduction to probability and statistics.

title: Stewart Calculus
author: James Stewart
description: A comprehensive introduction to single-variable and multivariable calculus, covering everything from limits to vector calculus with a focus on clarity and application.

title: Practical Object Oriented Design in Ruby
author: Sandi Metz
description: An explanation of OOD using realistic, understandable examples. A practical, readable introduction to how OOD can lower your costs and improve your applications.

title: Grokking Algorithms
author: Aditya Y. Bhargava
description: A fully illustrated, friendly guide that teaches you how to apply common algorithms to the practical problems you face every day as a programmer.
